description:
Track your snoozes

Alarmetrics listens to device notifications and tracks snoozed alarms, reminders, and calendar events.

Features:

  • Tracking: Automatically detects and records snoozed alarms, reminders, and events
  • Visualization: Graphs your snooze history across four time scales.
  • Private: Fully offline; your data never leaves your device.
  • Lightweight: Runs in the background with minimal battery and memory usage.
